data: VASC Day Surgery Venous Procedures / Venous Line Access / Fasciotomy Post Operative (Multiphase)
PACU Nurse to initiate "Phase I: PACU and Surgical Day Care (SDC)" Only
Discontinue VASC Pre Operative (Day of Surgery) PowerPlan
q1h for 2 hour, then q4h for 24 hour, then q6h for 24 hour, post-op day 1, then q8h for 24 hour, post-op day 2, then q12h for 24 hour, post-op day 3, then qdaily until discharge
on arrival to unit, then q4h for 48 hour, then q8h for 48 hour, then q12h for 24 hour, then qdaily until discharge
q1h for 2 hour, then  q4h for 24 hour, then q6h for 24 hours, post-op day 1, then q8h for 24 hours, post-op day 2, then q12h for 24 hours, post-op day 3, then qdaily until discharge
on arrival to unit, then  q4h for 48 hour, then q8h for 48 hours, then q12h for 24 hour, then qdaily until discharge
SDC Nurse to initiate this phase upon patient's arrival to Surgical Day Care (SDC)
If vital signs are stable and patient is comfortable
Give patient information pamphlet on discharge
order rate: 100 mL/h, IV, drug form: bag
order rate: 125 mL/h, IV, drug form: bag
order rate: 30 mL/h, IV, drug form: bag
order rate: 250 mL/h, IV, drug form: bag
TYLENOL #3 EQUIV tab PRN range dose
dose range: 1 to 2 tab, PO, q4h, PRN pain, drug form: tab
dose range: 5 to 10 mg, PO, q4h, PRN pain, drug form: tab
dose range: 2 to 4 mg, PO, q4h, PRN pain, drug form: tab
dose range: 325 to 650 mg, PO, q4h, PRN pain-mild, drug form: tab
dose range: 200 to 400 mg, PO, q6h, PRN pain-mild, drug form: tab
